postlist.title: Scopes in Servlet and JSP
postlist.excerpt:
Four Scopes

  • JSP Page Scope
  • Request Scope
  • Session Scope
  • Application or Ccontext Scope
postlist.text: Four ScopesJSP Page ScopeRequest ScopeSession ScopeApplication or Ccontext ScopeJSP Page ScopeDescriptionThe page scope restricts the scpoe
